name: Material Design List
description: This example shows how to use a list with the AppBar and FabButton from the Android Support Design Library

name: Ripple Background
description: This example demonstrates usage of the new Ripple animations available in Lollipop and how to create several animations in serial using Macroid

name: Path Morphing
description: This example demonstrates a new drawable created for this project called PathMorphDrawable, used for path segment transformations in Canvas

name: Circular Reveal
description: This example demonstrates Lollipop's new Circular Reveal and how it can be used in a Fragment. On non Lollipop devices it will fallback to using a fade animation

name: Google Maps
description: A simple example of using Google Maps in a project. Includes - changing map type and adding markers

name: Text Styles
description: A basic example to demonstrate project setup and define layouts and styles using Macroid

name: Akka Simon
description: Using the classic game Simon, this example demonstrates the use of Akka to communicate between fragments

name: Forecast API Request
description: This example demonstrates how to call an endpoint with the use of Future, parse the json from the response and show the requested data in a view
